episodes.summary: This week the team talks space travel as well as contacts that can change your perception.  Plus why is sending date through pork a good thing?  Find out NOW!

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.summary: This week we're LIVE from WonderCon 2016!  With special guest Jerry Trainor... and LOTS of drinks!

episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom give you their origin story, everything glasses and the apocalypse.  Also Alex does a little circus stunt... we think he'll be fine.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: F Bread Boxes
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom talk about poor robot deaths, how soon for the Moon and the Government... yes that's right, the Government.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Naked on Stage
episodes.summary: In this episode Alison, Alex and Tom talk about nudity in the theater as well as MOR ALIENS! Also let's see if how close we are to real time travel.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.summary: This week Alex recounts his adventure in the winter weather at Newark Airport, the team talk FCC and cable companies as well as ALIENS!!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Not Monica Lewinsky
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom deliver a classic Half Hour Happy Hour show with the perfect mix of Sex and Science?  They talk gravitational waves, orgasm clocks and video game sex devices.  It's all down hill from there.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Mad About Monkeys
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom get into science made meat, gene splicing and what the heck is a Solar Road?  C'est Bon!

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Sex Ed?
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Mr. Supervolcano discover the the best thing about being a Dutch driving instructor, talk about how robots will soon be making all our food and of course giant flightless stick insects.  What could go wrong?

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Vaginal Potpourri
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom talk about herbal vaginal detox balls, yes that's a thing.  And the return of doctor full body transplant!  Plus Alison witnesses a car accident. #PowerPonyTail

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Park Yourself Bitch
episodes.summary: This week Alison, Alex and Tom talk self parking cars, the worlds first bionic penis and the baffling fact that Microsoft has it's own digital watch... and has for a while!

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Alex vs. Movie Screeners
episodes.summary: This week Alex and Alison with Tom in tow dig into sex... with stories about a new male contraceptive nut switch and some good ol' VR porn!  Also Alex goes a little to in-depth with his fight with a movie screener.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Awkward Holiday Car Rides by Alison
episodes.summary: The team is back for their first sit down in 2016!  Champagne was had, stories were told and the garage was freezing.  Alison, Alex and Tom deliver a classic episode to start off the year.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Drunksmas Day 12
episodes.summary: It's the final day of Drunksmas, day 12.  Alison, Alex and Tom look back on their favorite moments, well mostly Alex and Tom because Alison is feeling the holiday!  Thanks for coming along for the ride!

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Drunksmas Day 11

episodes.title: Drunksmas Day 3

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Sex Utopia
episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex talk about a start up that aims to download your brain into a robot body so you can live forever!  Also rocket talk featuring Jeff Bezos... he's rocket goes up, and comes down.  Plus why we don't like waiting in lines, it's not what you think.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex get real scieney on magnetic wormholes, talk morals of driverless cars and is it a good thing or bad thing that NASA is using SpaceX?

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: One Tomato a Day

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: Dorm Master Tom
episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex talk about BlizzCon, becoming an Astronaut, killer Hypnosis and a dorms for adults.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: One F*&king Job Tom
episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex talk about a suicide coaster, a simple dream switch and a way to get more than your share of first class flights.  Wish we had thought of that!  Also Tom ends the show early... Alison = Not happy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.summary: This week Alex and Alison are amazed by the self driving car... it's HERE!  Drones be gone and McDonald's all day breakfast might be bad for business.

episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex look into the NASA announcement that water was found on Mars.  The dive bar as we know it is going away... where can all the toothless people drink?

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex

episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex get a little buzzed and talk space foods, VW scams and more sex bots... there's a theme!

episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex take on the robo-sex industry, fire tornadoes, baby fight club and finally invisibility cloaks!

episodes.summary: This week Alison and Alex cover the wild world of Apple TV, a man who's hand is sewn to his stomach, airplane ice from above and super mice... here to rule us all.

episodes.seriesTitle: Half Hour Happy Hour with Alison and Alex
episodes.title: RE-Creation
